oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1960-10-28 Wilson Library Bulletin Correspondence
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: libraries; civil rights; desegregation; Wallis, C. Lamar; Wakeman, John; Wilson Library Bulletin; periodicals; 1960s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two letters, sent between John Wakeman, Editor of the Wilson Library Bulletin, and Memphis Public Library Director Lamar Wallis.
